metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25292 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.1.1. The PDF parser allows a regular expression DoS (ReDoS) attack via a crafted PDF file because of a catastrophic backtracking regex.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25292` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.5
python-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.5
python3-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.5
python3-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.0-1ubuntu0.5').
